mapper.insert: insert into follow_order (follow_order_name, account_id,variety_id, follow_manner, max_profit, max_profit_number, max_loss, max_loss_number, account_loss, order_point, client_point, client_point_number, net_position_direction, net_position_change, net_position_follow_number, net_position_sum, net_position_hold_number, net_position_status,start_time,follow_order_status, update_date,update_by_user,create_date,create_user,version) values (#{followOrderName}, #{account.id},#{variety.id}, #{followManner}, #{maxProfit}, #{maxProfitNumber}, #{maxLoss}, #{maxLossNumber}, #{accountLoss}, #{orderPoint}, #{clientPoint}, #{clientPointNumber}, #{netPositionDirection}, #{netPositionChange}, #{netPositionFollowNumber}, #{netPositionSum}, #{netPositionHoldNumber}, #{netPositionStatus},#{startTime},#{followOrderStatus}, #{updateDate}, #{updateByUser} ,#{createDate},#{createUser},#{version} )
mapper.update:
update follow_order
follow_order_name = #{followOrderName},
account_id = #{account.id},
variety_id = #{variety.id},
follow_manner = #{followManner},
max_profit = #{maxProfit},
max_profit_number = #{maxProfitNumber},
max_loss = #{maxLoss},
max_loss_number = #{maxLossNumber},
account_loss = #{accountLoss},
order_point = #{orderPoint},
client_point = #{clientPoint},
client_point_number = #{clientPointNumber},
net_position_direction = #{netPositionDirection},
net_position_change = #{netPositionChange},
net_position_follow_number = #{netPositionFollowNumber},
net_position_sum =#{netPositionSum},
net_position_hold_number = #{netPositionHoldNumber},
net_position_status = #{netPositionStatus},
start_time = #{startTime},
follow_order_status = #{followOrderStatus},
update_date = #{updateDate},
update_by_user = #{updateByUser},
create_date = #{createDate},
create_user = #{createUser},
version = #{version} + 1
where id = #{id} and version = #{version}
mapper.sql: f.id, f.follow_order_name, f.account_id, f.variety_id, f.follow_manner, f.max_profit, f.max_profit_number, f.max_loss, f.max_loss_number, f.account_loss, f.order_point, f.client_point, f.client_point_number, f.net_position_direction, f.net_position_change, f.net_position_follow_number, f.net_position_sum, f.net_position_hold_number, f.net_position_status, f.follow_order_status, f.start_time, f.update_date, f.update_by_user, f.create_date, f.create_user, f.version
